product_name: Kryptonite KryptoLok Series-2 995 Integrated Chain Lock
long_description: This Kryptonite KryptoLok Series-2 995 Integrated Chain lock offers enhanced security, thanks to the chain being integrated into the lock head. 9mm, 4-sided chain links are made from 3t manganese steel for excellent strength and defense from would-be bike thiefs. Ends of the chain are protected and secured to the hardened deadbolt, eliminating a critical vulnerability point and enhancing security. Disc-style cylinder lock is pick- and drill-resistant; hardened deadbolt locking mechanism offers secure holding power. Chain is covered with a protective, weather-resistant nylon cover to ensure lasting use that also helps protect your frame's finish. Kryptonite KryptoLok Series-2 995 Integrated Chain lock comes with 2 "I" keys. Eligible for Key Safe Program; register your key number with Kryptonite for easy replacement of lost or worn keys for a minimal fee. Kryptonite rates this lock a 6 on their 10-point system with 1 being simple, deterrent security and 10 being extreme security.
short_description: This Kryptonite KryptoLok Series-2 995 Integrated Chain lock offers enhanced security, thanks to the chain being integrated into the lock head.
